publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4807 Nicola Sturgeon: Tobacco and Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Tobacco and Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Shona Robison*
